oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nashville Presents Season Camping Entertainers Schedule
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Osborne Brothers; Grandpa Jones, 1913-1998; Tillis, Mel; Clower, Jerry, 1926-1998; Florida Boys; Shepard, Jean, 1933-2016; Alabama (Musical group); Lynn, Loretta; Kendalls (Musical Group); Twitty, Conway; Jim and Jesse; Rodriguez, Johnny, 1951-; Conlee, John; Brown, Jim Ed; Haggard, Merle, 1937-2016; Country Gentlemen (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing country music show with the Osborne Brothers on May 15-17; Grandpa Jones with Kitty Wells, Martha Carson, and Hank Snow on May 24; Mel Tillis on May 31; Jerry Clower, Dave Dudley, and Charlie Douglas on June 7; the Kreskin, Florida Boys, Wendy Bagwells, Hinson Family, and the Happy Goodman Family on June 14; Jean Shepard, Toky Matsu and Jimmy C. Newman on June 21; Alabama on June 28; Loretta Lynn and the Coal Miners on July 5; the Kendall's and Jeannie C. Riley on July 12; Conway Twitty on July 26; Jim and Jesse on July 31- August 2; Johnny Rodriguez, Jack Greene and Jeannie Seely on August 9; John Conlee on August 23; Jim Ed Brown and Razzy Bailey on August 30; Merle Haggard on September 6; and the Country Gentlemen on September 11-13. Poster features metal photoplates of featured artists.
